message.body: How many horsepower is yr table saw?
Hmmm could you double check and let me know. I thought it was 1.75 or 2. And I'm trying to decide what I need for shop space.
I feel that it mostly bogs down because the belt is somewhat loose/worn. Have you ever tuned it up?

I burned my belt up and replaced it several years ago I think the new one is slightly different and a little too long or something. But there's no reason not to get 3hp table saw for woodshop if you are going to be ripping thick and hard stock.
Do you know anyone who trues and tunes up saws. I would love to get my chop precisely re squared as well. I'm gonna start using a sacrificial fence for cutting framestock which might help

Yeah, I've been researching how to get things precise and am gonna grab a feeler gauge and some other stuff when setting up the shop next week. If you wanna come see how I do it you can borrow my stuff. It's not rocket science.
